code: import React from'react';import"./MainPage.css";import Card from"../../Components/Card";import{ApiLibrary}from'../../Library';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";class MainPage extends React.Component{constructor(props){super(props);this.state={windowSize:[window.innerWidth,window.innerHeight],videoCodeList:[]};const handleResize=()=>{this.setState(current=>({windowSize:[window.innerWidth,window.innerHeight]}));};window.addEventListener("resize",handleResize);}componentDidMount(){const aLib=new ApiLibrary();aLib.GetRandomVideos(this.state.keyword).then(e=>{const list=e.videoCodes;console.log(list);this.setState(cur=>{return{videoCodeList:list};});});}render(){const margin=30;const sizeMin=300;const columnCount=Math.floor(window.innerWidth/sizeMin);const thumbWidth=(window.innerWidth-margin*2)/columnCount;const thumbHeight=Math.floor(thumbWidth*0.8);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"MainPage",style:{gridTemplateColumns:"repeat("+columnCount+", "+thumbWidth+"px)",gridTemplateRows:"repeat("+10+", "+thumbHeight+"px)"},children:this.state.videoCodeList.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{videoCode:item,width:thumbWidth,height:thumbHeight}))});}}export default MainPage;
